title: Zero Carb Slushie
directions: Here is the easy peasy recipe:

Put the Jello into a bowl. Pour the boiling water over the Jello and stir until gelatin is dissolved. Add in the 1/3 cup ice water and stir. Add in the heavy cream and vanilla extract and stir some more.
Put the crushed ice and the gelatin in a blender and blend until you have this delicious creamy drink! Top with sugar free whipped cream, if you like.
ingredients: 1 pkg (4 servings size) sugar free Jello gelatin (any flavor)
